: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus picks up his daughter, holding her close.

Rodimus Prime: I can tell that you are going to be a strong girl.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:Elita:

Eliata laughted and giggled more she spread her little arms towards 
her daddy.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> Rodimus looked at his fully transformed daughter. He could see the 
influences from Nightlight and himself.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Now you see your true form hunny. You are a 
cybertroian transformer.
> 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:Elita:
> 
> Elita started to laught more and more. Sometimes, by seconds, 
seemed 
> that her little chest would open to show the rest of her robot 
mode. 
> At last, that help her to complete her tranform. 
> 
> She looked extraordinary like her mommy, but with several things 
> that she heired from her daddy: Her metallic skin was like 
> Nightlight's, her robot mode mixed Golden, red and copper. Her 
> helmet was like Rodimu's; her eyes were like his father and like 
> Nightlight, her face, arms and leg had silver. 
> 
> Elita was amazing about her hands and feet, she looked facinated 
how 
> her fingers moved. Her tranformation and look were almost as her 
> mom; but she and anyone didn't know by now, that her behavior would 
> be as his dad.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > She was still in mid transformation so Rodimus tickles her again. 
> Maybe he could trigger the rest of the change.
> > 
> > 
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:Elita:
> > 
> > elita didn't understand what her daddy liked that she did. She 
> just 
> > watched and continued looking her little legs... They moved, they 
> > moved when she wished that moved then they belongs her... she 
> looked 
> > again at her daddy as she thought herself what will happen next.
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > Rodimus had to laugh as his daughter was stuck in mid 
> > transformation. He knew that she couldn't control it at such a 
> young 
> > age.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus Prime: Come on hunny, try a little harder. You almost 
> have 
> > it.
> > > 
> > > Rodimus tried to guide the movement of the parts so that she 
> would 
> > catch on, and finish the sequence herself.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:Elita:
> > > 
> > > Elita laughted more while she was trying to caught Rodimus' 
> hand, 
> > > she suddenly sneezed; that did that half of her little body 
> > > transformed and  small and little legs showed. It seemed that 
> her 
> > > robot mode will mix silver, gold and copper.
> > > 
> > > She looked her tiny legs and looked at her daddy, her youth 
> brain 
> > > asked her self what was that (Her legs) and where're her beast 
> > legs. 
> > > It would take time until she can control her trasformation
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > He lays Elita on the bed, and tickles her. It was nice to 
hear 
> > the 
> > > laughs and gigles of the child.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:Elita:
> > > > 
> > > > Elita gigled and babbled, she was very happy that her dad was 
> > > there. 
> > > > The little baby had almost forgotten her mommy: She just 
> varely 
> > > > remember her sweet voice, and her smell. 
> > > > 
> > > > Elita liked play and moved happily while her dad spoke to her 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
> <roborick007@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
> > > > > Kup: Yes, laying dorment untill the volcano erupts in 1984. 
> > The 
> > > > Predacons could change that, they have tried before, 
according 
> > to 
> > > > Optimus Primal's reports from the first Beast Wars.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Rodimus Prime: We need a team over there to intercept them.
> > > > > 
> > > > > He gets the signal from the crib.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Rodimus Prime: I have to go to Elita. Get a team together, 
> > I'll 
> > > > return soon to lead them.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Rodimus goes to his quarters. There he takes Elita out of 
> the 
> > > crib, 
> > > > holding her.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Rodimus Prime: Hello, my little one.
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Yggdrasil nearly jumped at 
> the 
> > > > mention of the legendary name.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Yggdrasil: The Ark?!? It's here?!?!
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
> > <roborick007@y...> 
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
> > > > > > Rodimus Prime: The problem is that our spy to get 
> > Nightlight, 
> > > is
> > > > > already in their base.

> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Kup: Roddy, Yggdrasil, my security systems just gave an 
> > > alarming
> > > > > situation. I got Predacon signatures... at the Ark!
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Yggdrasil: Spy on her 
> first. 
> > In 
> > > the
> > > > > Iron Squad, we use a special
> > > > > > "mole" device that slowly analyzes a bot. If you manage 
to 
> > > snipe 
> > > > it on
> > > > > > her, she'll be tagged and we'll know anything we want to.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
> > > <roborick007@y...> 
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > : : Rodimus Prime : :
> > > > > > > Rodimus Prime: How are we supposed to do that? If we 
> wait 
> > to 
> > > > capture
> > > > > > Nightlight we may not be able to make the clone fast 
> enough 
> > to 
> > > > replace
> > > > > > her without the Preds knowing.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > >

> check 
> > > of 
> > > > the
> > > > > > data he had "captured" and nodded
> > > > > > > with a surprised expression.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Yggdrasil: Oh yes, yes! That's even more than enough! 
> It's 
> > > as

work 
> > > with

> > > > First
> > > > > > > Nightlight so we know how to make this clone and how 
> > she'll 
> > > > have to

online 
> > > from 
> > > > sleep
> > > > > > > mode. Yggdrasil's computer had gotton all of
